name: Red-Eyes Phoenix
text: This card's name becomes "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" on the field or in the GY. If a "Red-Eyes" Dragon monster is sent to the GY while this card is in the GY: Special Summon this card in face-up Defense Position but its ATK becomes 0. If you do, monsters your opponent currently controls lose 400 ATK until the end of the turn. You can only use the effect of "Red-Eyes Phoenix" once per turn.
